title: Creamy Asparagus, Potato and Leek Soup

ingredients.content: 400 g green asparagus, woody ends removed
10 g fresh chives, snipped, for garnish

preparations.content: Place oil, onions, leeks and potatoes in mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula, then sauté <b>5 min/120°C/speed 1<b>.
Add water, stock cube, salt and pepper then cook <b>10 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Meanwhile, separate asparagus tips from asparagus stalks then cut stalks in pieces (3 cm).
Add thyme, marjoram, and asparagus stalks then cook <b>6 min/100°C/speed 1<b>. Blend <b>1 min/speed 9<b>.
Add asparagus tips and cook <b>2 min/100°C//speed 1<b>. Serve hot garnished with chives and a swirl of cream.
